issue.message: For `minSdkVersion`=30 only `android:` attributes should be used
For `minSdkVersion`=30 only `android:` attributes should be used

Unnecessary; SDK_INT is always >= 31
Very long vector path (940 characters), which is bad for performance. Considering reducing precision, removing minor details or rasterizing vector.
